title: 'Her skin’s so beautiful': Trump’s unexpected praise for Nicki Minaj steals spotlight at Black History Month event in White House
summary_full: President Donald Trump made headlines at a White House Black History Month event with personal praise for rapper Nicki Minaj. His comments on her beauty and nails quickly spread online. This moment gained attention due to Minaj's visible political support for Trump. The incident fuels discussions on celebrity involvement in politics and messaging during significant national observances.
